title: Fresh As A Daisy
description:
This week, Jeremie’s in the hot seat as our audience gets a chance to know him better. Plus, various body odors, what they mean for your health, and how to banish them! And last, Jillian counsels caller Tammicia on how to give your kids a healthy appreciation for fitness.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
